title: The Best Movies of 2020 … So Far
description:
Movie theaters have been closed for more than half the year, but we’ve still gotten our fair share of great films. Adam Nayman joins Sean and Amanda to share their top five movies so far this year.

Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
Guest: Adam Nayman
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
